channel.title: Serv lag
channel.description: my server lag as the hell and i get this in runserver [code]Isle Pkz V.2s Is now starting with port: 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1463 Client type: high memory version UserId: 1076755 F I N A L is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [client-1-F I N A L]: Loading finished. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16528) at client.process(client.java:16513) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) Isle Pkz V.2 Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player F I N A L ClientHandler: Client F I N A L disconnected. [/code] know how make the server unlagg?

item.title: Serv lag
item.dc:creator: @mrdek11 mrdek11
item.description:
@mrdek11 wrote:

Try it with just yourself, see if you still get the errors. Is it still laggy?

item.title: Serv lag
item.dc:creator: @i_own_u1 i_own__u
item.description:
@i_own_u1 wrote:

my server lag as the hell and i get this in runserver

Isle Pkz V.2s Is now starting with port: 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1463 Client type: high memory version UserId: 1076755 F I N A L is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [client-1-F I N A L]: Loading finished. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16528) at client.process(client.java:16513) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) Isle Pkz V.2 Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player F I N A L ClientHandler: Client F I N A L disconnected.
know how make the server unlagg?

Read full topic
